rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome residents with natural light and open space, adhering to Vastu principles for an auspicious entry.
An open-plan living area that seamlessly integrates the kitchen, featuring ample windows for natural light and cross ventilation.
Open plan with modern Scandinavian design elements, integrated with the living room. Windows on the east ensure morning light as per Vastu guidelines.
The master bedroom is located towards the north-east for positive energy, with a private balcony for fresh air and natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom designed with balanced proportions, windows oriented according to Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom ensuring ample space and natural lighting; positioned with respect to directional energy flow.
A compact, well-ventilated room with east-facing windows as per Vastu recommendations for positive energy.
Bathroom designed with privacy in mind and sufficient ventilation; features a small window to allow natural light without compromising on aesthetics.
A dedicated dining area adjacent to the living room, promoting family interaction while ensuring ample airflow.

openings.details: Large casement windows on the south and west walls for maximum natural light and cross ventilation, designed in a Scandinavian minimalist style.
Modern sliding door that opens to the garden, ensuring smooth flow of fresh air according to Vastu guidelines.
A double-leaf automatic garage door for ease of access and a modern look consistent with the overall Scandinavian design.
East-facing window to invite morning light, as per Vastu recommendations.

garage.description: A two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan with easy access from the entrance hall. It features a Scandinavian design aesthetic and incorporates functional storage space.
